#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
const ll inf = 1e10;
const ll SIZE = 1e5+5;
void solve(int n){
    ll sum = 0LL;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
            sum+=n-n%i;
    }
    cout<<sum<<endl;
}

int main()
{
    int n;
    cin>>n;
    solve(n);
    return 0;

}
